pages.text: $(br)Greatly increases the potency of the metals you are burning for the player you hit. $(br)$(br)$(br)$(br)$(br) Bonus: $(br) - Works for a short time and drains all Allomantic reserves the target player was burning.

pages.title: Interacciones
pages.text: $(br) + Duralumin: Apply the effect in medium area. $(br2) + Lerasium: Apply the effect to a small area. $(br2) + Both: Apply the effect to a large area.
